name: CongloMerate (Aman)
description:
Story:

A man who thinks that he is the only one left in the city and uncovers the truth about the city by following an unknown voice. At last he uncovers the real truth about the apocalyptic city and then came to know that he(Or You for the player) is not alone. 

      

Controls:

W,A,S,D for movement.

Mouse aim Control

Space - Jump

control - Crouch

Interact - E

Sprint - Left Shift

       

Developer:

 ZGen Studio(Co-founded by me and tanoid)

Disclaimer : This game is developed in one week for brackeys game jam 2022 themed You are not Alone.

 

  • Feel free to give your feedback in the comment section below.
  • PC version of this game with some extra polish and some extra fun stuff will be available soon on our studio's page.
  • If you like the game and want us to keep making much better games then please follow us on our Instagram page and itch.io page.
